snippet: After tracking teenage girls over three years, a study found that those who smoked showed slower development of bone mineral density, but more research is needed.
abstract: After tracking teenage girls over three years, a study found that those who smoked showed slower development of bone mineral density, but more research is needed.

headline.main: Lower Bone Density for Girls Who Smoke
headline.print_headline: Risks: Lower Bone Density for Girls Who Smoke
